Class ConfigurationSelectorTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AlgorithmTrainer>, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConfigurationSelectorTrainer
extends AlgorithmTrainer
    The Class ConfigurationSelectorTrainer. This is used from algorithms which can select the best configuration out of a set of possible ones.
    Author:
    Tommy
